SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.category_id, c.category_name, i.img_url, p.price, p.brand_id, p.seller_uid, p.size, p.quality, p.deal_means, p.safe_deal, p.update_date FROM ( SELECT product_id, product_name, category_id, price, brand_id, seller_uid, size, quality, deal_means, safe_deal, update_date FROM tbl_product
WHERE brand_id = #{brandId} ) p, tbl_category c, tbl_product_img i WHERE p.category_id = c.category_id AND p.product_id = i.product_id AND i.img_main = "1" ORDER BY update_date DESC LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{rowsPerPage}

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.category_id, c.category_name, p.price, p.brand_id, p.seller_uid, p.size, p.quality, p.deal_means, p.safe_deal, p.update_date, p.description FROM ( SELECT product_id, product_name, category_id, price, brand_id, seller_uid, size, quality, deal_means, safe_deal, update_date, description FROM tbl_product WHERE product_id = #{productId}) p, tbl_category c WHERE p.category_id = c.category_id
SELECT m.user_name, m.user_rank FROM ( SELECT product_id, seller_uid FROM tbl_product WHERE product_id = #{productId}) p, tbl_member m WHERE p.seller_uid = m.uid
SELECT COUNT(p.product_id) AS countSell FROM (SELECT seller_uid FROM tbl_product WHERE product_id = #{productId}) s, tbl_product p WHERE p.seller_uid = s.seller_uid AND p.selling_status = "selling";
